alert.note: Alert for Robeson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 30 at 10:58PM EDT until further notice by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in North Carolina...South Carolina... Northeast Cape Fear River Near Burgaw affecting Pender County. Lumber River Near Lumberton affecting Robeson County. Lumber River 1 SE Nichols affecting Horry, Dillon and Marion Counties. Lynches River At Effingham affecting Florence County. For the Northeast Cape Fear River...including Burgaw...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lumber River...including Nichols, Pembroke, Lumberton Usgs Gage, Maxton, Lumberton, Boardman...Moderate flooding is forecast. For the Lynches River...including Effingham...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lumber River near Lumberton. * WHEN...From late tonight until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 16.0 feet, Flooding worsens in the Pines and Coxs Pond areas as well as along River Road. Flooding also worsens between the Pepsi plant and the river on the east side of town. In addition, Chickenfoot Road, Hestertown Road and Noir Street will have flood waters on them. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:35 PM EDT Wednesday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight and continue rising to a crest of 16.5 feet Friday morning. - Flood stage is 13.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Additional information is available at water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=ilm . The next statement will be issued by Thursday afternoon.
